spec_data.Name: python-openopt
spec_data.Description:
Universal numerical optimization package with several
own solvers (e.g. ralg) and connections to tens of
other, graphical output of convergence and many other
goodies.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 02:20:42 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A python module for numerical optimization
